Text.Page: Seir is waiting for <PCNAME> to confirm the funeral arrangements.
After the funeral, <PCNAME> shared goodbyes with Jelena and was ready once again to go to Exodor.

Thank you for coming, .

There's so much that Elleon has done for the federation...

I've decided to hold Elleon's funeral in the name of the Valkyon Federation.

His family said that they'll conduct the ceremony. Ask Sinoeta if everything is ready and come back to the plaza.

. The funeral is now ready.

I...I never thought we'd lose him like this....

, everyone's ready?

I'd knew a day like this would come, but not so soon...The federation would never be the same without him, but he'll always be with us.

Let's start the funeral.

, have you seen Jelena?

The federation made a statue of Elleon and wants to place it at Velika. I wanted her to do the honor but I can't find her.

Will you do it?

Yes, I heard the news. A statue...

I was only trouble to Elleon...I couldn't save him.

, please dedicate the statue for me. It'll mean a lot.

Thank you .

Elleon will always be remembered as a federation hero.

. It's now your turn to fight the Azart in the name of the Valkyon Federation and for Elleon!

Oh, and if you see Jelena, please tell her that the federation still needs her and that we're waiting for her.

Seir said that?

But...I'm not sure if there's anything I can do...

I can't think of anything right now...thanks for coming, .

But I want to leave for now.
